verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As the Spirit was moving over the water
Spirit come move over us
Come rest on us
Come rest on us

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Come down, Spirit when you move you make my heart pound
When you fill the room
You're here and I know you're moving
I'm here and I know you'll fill me

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Fire and wind, come and do it again
Open up the gates, let heaven on in
Come rest on us
Come rest on us

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit come rest on us
You're all we want
You're all we want
